name: Turtle Town (Zarkonnen) (Zarkonnen)
description:
Your people live in a city on the animal, a gigantic turtle. It is time for her to go to the ocean and lay her eggs.

Can you survive the trip?

Post-jam version of a GGJ2020 game by David Stark and Philomena Schwab.

Credits:

David Stark: Design, Programming, Audio
Philomena Schwab: Design, Graphics
